effect.ruby_sapphire: Discards the user’s stat changes and copies the target’s. This move cannot be copied by mirror move.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Copies the foe’s effect(s) and gives to the user.
flavor_text.emerald: Copies the foe’s effect(s) and gives to the user.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the foe.
